climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Powerful Cleaning: The Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets effectively eliminate dirt, grime, and limescale from your washing machine, ensuring a thorough clean every time.
One-Year Supply: With 24 tablets in each pack, our one-year supply ensures you have enough tablets for bi-monthly use, keeping your washing machine fresh and efficient all year long.
Easy to Use: Simply drop one tablet into the drum, run a hot cycle without any laundry, and let the tablet dissolve to release a cleansing foam that reaches every corner of your machine.
Extends Machine Lifespan: Regular use of these cleaner tablets prevents residue buildup, optimizing your washing machine's performance and extending its lifespan.

Versatile Compatibility: Suitable for all types of washing machines, including front-loading, top-loading, and high-efficiency models. Tested and approved for GE, LG, Samsung, Whirlpool, Maytag, Electrolux machines & More.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets, the ultimate solution for a fresh and efficient laundry experience. With 24 tablets in each pack, designed for bi-monthly use, this one-year supply ensures a hassle-free maintenance routine for your washing machine.

Over time, your washing machine can accumulate dirt and grime as well as stubborn residues from detergents and fabric softeners. These build-ups not only affect your machine's performance but also impact the cleanliness and freshness of your clothes. That's where Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets come to the rescue! Our specially formulated tablets dissolve and penetrate deep within your machine, targeting hard-to-reach areas where residue and odors hide. The powerful cleaning agents break down and eliminate dirt and limescale leaving your machine sparkling clean and fresh.

With 24 tablets, this one-year supply easily integrates into your cleaning routine. Keep your laundry smelling great and your washing machine performing its best with Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets. Invest in Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets today for a fresh and hygienic laundry experience every time!

Using Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets is a breeze. Simply drop one tablet into the drum, run a hot cycle without laundry, and let it work its magic. As the tablet dissolves, it releases a cleansing foam that reaches every nook and cranny of your machine, ensuring a thorough clean. Regular use prevents the build-up of dirt and residue, allowing your washing machine to operate at its peak performance while also extending the life of the machine. Your clothes will come out cleaner and fresher, while you save on energy costs with an efficient machine. Rest assured, Bastion Washing Machine Cleaner Tablets are safe and suitable for all types of machines, including front-loading, top-loading, and high-efficiency models. The non-toxic formula is gentle on your machine's components, yet tough on grime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great inexpensive product. My washer had a moldy smell. I usually buy the expensive brand the washer recommends. I decided to try this brand. It worked really well. It took away the smell. It cost way less than the leading brand and I have a year supply!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive and easy to use product to sanitize my top loader. It has been several months since the last time I sanitized the unit but I live alone and do laundry once per week. That being said, it's easy to use but not sure exactly what it was supposed to do. Thankfully my washer is working the same, no odors, no residue from the product either so I'll leave it five stars. As always, I end up cleaning the agitator and bleach dispenser areas myself anyway. Don't expect any help with either one with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use, appears to work well, and is of good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My washing machine looked so clean and smelled good. So easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I don't know whether or not it is effective.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these because my top load washer has a cleaning cycle and recommends cleaning monthly, though I didn't notice this until more than a year after purchase. It has never exhibited any detectable odor, and it doesn't smell any different after using this product. Even so, I think, since I have them, I'll use them monthly. However, if your machine smells bad, perhaps you might consider using them more often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, effective, and no obnoxious fragrance
reviews.reviewText: The namebrand that I bought in the supermarket were so obnoxiously fragranced that my whole house smelled when I used them. Most distressing, my clothes came out smelling like industrial cleaner for several washings afterwardsI was happy to find this fragrance free version, which comes in tablets and consequently as much easier to store less messy to use. Would highly recommend and purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They honestly work
reviews.reviewText: These are great for cleaning my washing machine!I was really skeptical at first because you get a whole twelve months worth and they’re really inexpensive and when the package arrived, the tablet was small.I thought how would this small tablet clean my washing machine?Well, let me tell you the small tablets pack a big punch.These clean my washing machine so well and the amount of bubbles and suds from such a small tablet, amazed me.I will give this product a raving review because it worked and the price was great.In conclusion, I will repurchase, and I am happy with this product and the price.On a sidenote, we use our washing machine daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved the price and it worked great

Definitely a purchase that did as promised, so I will use it once a month as described. Cleans better than bleach and I have a front loading machine that gets funky smelling, and I leave it open to dry out. Very happy with my purchase, I saw the ad on FB, but checked here first. Much cheaper and no shipping. 😊
Less $$ than the leading product that does the same thing, and great job too
